sentences.english: We do more reading after school.
sentences.chinese: 我们做更多的课外阅读是很重要的。

sentences.english: My CCA (Co-Curricular Activity) is Table Tennis.
sentences.chinese: 我的课外活动是乒乓球。

sentences.english: "Aesop's Fables" is one of my favorite extra-curricular reading books.
sentences.chinese: 《伊索寓言》这本书是我最喜爱读的课外书之一。

sentences.english: In- class teaching in combination with after-class activities.
sentences.chinese: 课内与课外相结合的教学。

sentences.english: We may often utilize Sundays to read reference books.
sentences.chinese: 我们也可以利用星期日来看看课外书。

sentences.english: The teacher considers homework a necessary complement to classroom work.
sentences.chinese: 老师认为课外作业是对课堂内容的必要补充。

sentences.english: As former deputy dean, I used to be responsible for students' extracurricular work.
sentences.chinese: 作为前副主任，我曾负责学生的课外活动工作。

sentences.english: You can sign up for the program with him and begin the tutoring next week.
sentences.chinese: 您可以与他的方案和开始下一周的课外辅导。

sentences.english: He is still working away at his homework.
Will there be classwork and homework on the first day?
sentences.chinese: 开学第一天会有随堂作业和课外作业吗？

sentences.english: It's time for us to do some extra exercises.
sentences.chinese: 现在是我们做课外巩固练习的时候了。

sentences.english: As well as studying, Wai Yee enjoyed participating in some of the many activities available at the University.
sentences.chinese: 读书以外，蕙仪喜欢参与大学多彩多姿的课外活动。

sentences.english: Many jukus offer high salaries to recruit experienced teachers.
sentences.chinese: 许多课外补习学校高薪招聘有经验的教师。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the advice on extracurricular reading materials is brought up in excursus.
sentences.chinese: 同时在附录部分还提出了“关于课外读物建议”。

sentences.english: So they suggest online novels should be served as out-of-class reading materials.
sentences.chinese: 因此，他们建议在线小说应作为课外阅读材料。

definition: to take extra lessons in a cram school or with a private tutor
all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO)/abbr. for 國際奧林匹克數學競賽|国际奥林匹克数学竞赛[Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Shu4 xue2 Jing4 sai4]
